info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 2 at 12:52PM CDT until April 8 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis TN
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Arkansas...Missouri...
Saint Francis River at Lake City
Saint Francis River near Saint Francis
For the Saint Francis River...including Saint Francis, Lake City... Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Saint Francis River at Lake City.
* WHEN...From Friday evening to early Tuesday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Flooding is occurring in the swamps along the river.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 5.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday evening to a crest of 11.0 feet Saturday evening. Pay close attention to subsequent forecasts as multiple days of rain will impact the crest and duration of the flooding. The river will likely remain elevated through at least the weekend. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis.
The next statement will be issued as needed.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING TO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING
